Bujjhaka，（adj．） [fr．budh] intelligent，prudent，judicicus，in a° Dpvs IX．17，foolish，imprudent，unmindful of their own interest （trsln suggested by E．Hardy as preferable to Oldenberg’s “unnoticed＂）．Morris，J．P．T．S．1893，69 suggests “not fighting，＂ thus making abujjhaka= avujjh°=ayujjh° （of yudh）．（Page 488）

bujjhaka：ဗုဇ္ဈ-က （တိ）
သိတတ်သည်။
